name: European Renewable Energies Federation asbl
goal:
EREF is the European interest and lobby group for independent producers of electricity and fuels from all renewable energy sources except large hydro.

In a nutshell:

EREF is the voice of Renewable Energy Producer
EREF is the watchdog of the energy sector
EREF is the promoter for a renewable energy value chain and regional sustainable development
EREF is providing detailed information for public and media.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Implementation of EU Energy Union legislation in national legislation of EU Member states

Revision of EU State Aid Guidelines

Circular Econmy Directive

Revision of Water Framework Directive
